original_text: God has chosen a good time for all things to happen. He has caused people to think about things that will continue for ever. But nobody can completely understand everything that God has done, from the beginning of their lives to the end. God has chosen a good time for all things to happen. He has caused people to think about things that will continue for ever. But nobody can completely understand everything that God has done, from the beginning of their lives to the end.
korean_text: 하나님이 모든 것을 지으시되 때를 따라 아름답게 하셨고 또 사람들에게는 영원을 사모하는 마음을 주셨느니라 그러나 하나님이 하시는 일의 시종을 사람으로 측량할 수 없게 하셨도다

sentences.original_text: God has chosen a good time
He has caused people to think
about things that will continue for ever

sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 아무도 완전히 이해할 수 없다

sentences.original_text: from the beginning of their lives
God has chosen a good time
He has caused people to think
about things that will continue for ever
